sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEIZE, in the ſea-language, is to make faſt or bind, particularly to faſten two ropes together with rope-yarn. The ſeizing of a boat is a rope tied to a ring or little chain in the fore-ſhip of the boat, by which means it is faſtened to the side of the ſhip.
